item.description:
Heal the Earth, Heal Ourselves 3 Sundays, April 17 & 24, &  May 1    7-8:30pm Come to one gathering or come to all three, pay as you go $15 per evening*   The waves of energy coming through to the earthly plane, earth changes, new astrological alignments and solar flares have affected us! We are feeling these undefinable energies in our physical bodies and may have a myriad of vague physical symptoms that come and go.  We may be feeling fatigued or "lost" in our bearings at times. This plane and our own lives may not feel as safe and secure as we once imagined.   Helene leads this gathering as we collect to connect with Divine beings of Light and feel the power of their healing energy.  Helene is able to channel and amplify their energy and speak the words they want us all to hear.  Join us as we all send Light to the planet and receive powerful energies to clear and ground ourselves.   *ALL are welcome!  If you are caught in this tide of financial chaos and would like to attend at no charge, please email Helene directly at Helene@AngelsLighthouse.com. 
For a list of all programs at A Higher Balance, go to www.AHigherBalance.com
item.why: Collect with Divine Beings of Light to heal ourselves and the earth with the gifted psychic medium/channel Helene Olsen. Three Sundays (come to one or all) beginning April 17, 7:00-8:30 pm.
item.name: Heal the Earth, Heal Ourselves
